casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Thomas Craig CAMPBELL 252PA14-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 16, 2018 Barbara S. Blackman, Assistant Appellate Defender, Hannah H. Love, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Campbell, Thomas Craig. Teresa M. Postell, Assistant Attorney General, Mike Miller, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th of February 2018 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of February 2018."
